means: 切除…的内脏( eviscerate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The censors eviscerated the book to make it inoffensive to the President.
sentence.Network_cn: 审查员删去了该书的精华以取悦于总统。

sentence.Network_en: By the expulsion of surgery from the liberal arts medicine herself was eviscerated.
sentence.Network_cn: 把外科排除于丰富的艺术之外,就使得医学本身去掉了内脏一样.

sentence.Network_en: The compromise among the parties eviscerated the bill that had been proposed.
sentence.Network_cn: 各方折中使得提案中的精华消失殆尽.

list.abs: frozen egg 冰蛋frozen eviscerated broiler 冻全净膛肉用鸡frozen fat meat 冻肥肉
沪江词库精选evisceration是什么意思、英语单词推荐、用法及解释、中英文句子翻译、... evisceration scoop 眼球摘出匙  obstetrical evisceration 胎脏除去术.
frozen broiler half-eviscerated 冻半净膛鸡frozen broiler intestine 冻肉用鸡肠frozen broiler liver 冻肉用鸡肝frozen broiler meat 冻肉用鸡肉frozen broiler neck.
eviscerated　去内脏（的）eviscerated poultry　去内脏的家禽eviscerating　去内脏

entry.tran: 除去…的内脏；切除…的内部器官
entry.def: To eviscerate a person or animal means to remove their internal organs, such as their heart, lungs, and stomach.

example.ex: ...strangling and eviscerating rabbits for the pot.
example.tran: 将兔子勒死，去除内脏后放到锅里做菜

entry.def: If you say that something will eviscerate an organization or system, you are emphasizing that it will make the organization or system much weaker or much less powerful.

example.ex: Democrats say the petition will eviscerate state government.
example.tran: 民主党人说这次请愿将会重创州政府。

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its throat had been ripped out and it had been eviscerated.

auth_sentence.content: First he was eviscerated on the web; now he is under formal disciplinary investigation.
